EmailTemplate.name: February 2016.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for the February Town Hall
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there, Bigcommerce Town Hall <[[#]]>
When: December 17, 2015 from 3–4pm ET
What: An in-depth look at the latest improvements including Stencil, Square, social integrations (Facebook, Pinterest, and Twitter), 2016 product roadmap, and time for Q&A
Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and CPO Tim Schulz
Where: If applicable Reserve your spot <[[#]]> We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community forum <[[#]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the forum Hope to see you there,
The Bigcommerce Team {{my.LitmusToken}}
